thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Mesut Ozil attracting interest from Chinese Super League as Wayne Rooney looks set to leave Manchester United
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Mesut Ozil attracting interest from Chinese Super League as Wayne Rooney looks set to leave Manchester United

author: dcutts
title: Arsenal transfer news: Mesut Ozil attracting interest from Chinese Super League as Wayne Rooney looks set to leave Manchester United
text:
EFL TO CHINA, NOT OZ Arsenal transfer news: Mesut Ozil attracting interest from Chinese Super League as Wayne Rooney looks set to leave Manchester United 
The 28-year-old World Cup winner has been heavily criticised in recent weeks Revealed Click to share on Facebook (Opens in new window) Comments MESUT Ozil is the latest start to attract interest from the Chinese Super League as he dithers on a new Arsenal contract. 3 Mesut Ozil is the latest start to attract interest from the Chinese Super League 
And it emerged today the ex-Real Madrid ace is the second most popular player in China behind Real Madrid superstar Cristiano Ronaldo . 
It comes as Chinese Super League clubs eye-up the German midfielder, looking to bring him in for a staggering transfer fee. Arsenal star Mesut Ozil stars in the latest advert for Mercedes Benz cars More on Chinese Super League Gunner get Roo Arsenal should make shock bid to sign China-bound Wayne Rooney, according to Harry Redknapp 'China? Madness' Roy Keane slams Wayne Rooney’s China move and says he must stay in one of Europe's top leagues counting the dost Chinese Super League side Tianjin TEDA make £34million move for Sporting Lisbon striker Bas Dost In Rood health Wayne Rooney could receive an incredible £15MILLION pay-off from Man United if he makes China move it's coleen flewney As hubby Wayne prepares to take off for megabucks deal in Chinese Super League, Coleen Rooney takes to the skies rich list Wayne Rooney set to leapfrog Paul Pogba, Carlos Tevez and Cristiano Ronaldo as world's top earning footballer Pepe China crisis Real Madrid defender Pepe has second thoughts about China move due to new rules restricting foreign players HOW MUCH! Fulham flop Kostas Mitroglou a £38million target for Chinese Super League side Tianjin Quanjian 
He would also be able to nearly double his £300,000-a-week Arsenal wages, as Chinese sides look to splash the cash before new regulations on overseas players come in. 
The 31-year-old's agent Paul Stretford is in China looking to negotiate a deal, giving a clear indication Jose Mourinho is allowing him to leave Old Trafford. PA:Press Association Wayne Rooney is also attracting interest from China and he is set to leave Manchester United Getty Images 3 Jose Mourinho is allowing Rooney to leave United after years of service 
The England captain has been aware of interest in bringing him to the country for some time, and MLS clubs are also looking to swoop. 
Meanwhile, Manchester United have replaced Bayern Munich as the most popular team online in China , according to a new report.
